title: White Minion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Establish a chat between two players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- There's already a chat with at least one of the players, the chats will merge into one.
- Targets will have a 25% chance to be transfurred in the process

desc:
Post 2896
*"These things are the reason the latex isn't bulletproof. consequently, they shouldn't have been fireproof as well. These things spread like crazy. We're lucky they don't often try to escape" -Dr.K███████, MIT.*
